keyword: how many calories in oikos triple zero
title: How Many Calories in Oikos Triple Zero?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Oikos Triple Zero yogurt per serving, including protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for this nonfat Greek yogurt.
h1: How Many Calories in Oikos Triple Zero?
assumptions: Nonfat Greek yogurt, 5.3 oz (150 g) single-serve container, standard vanilla flavor; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and exact serving size. Check product label for most accurate values.

quick_answer.text: One 150 g container of Oikos Triple Zero has 100 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Oikos Triple Zero yogurt?
What is the protein content in Oikos Triple Zero?
faqs.a: 15 g protein per serving, making it a high-protein snack.

faqs.q: Does Oikos Triple Zero have fat or added sugar?
faqs.a: Zero fat and zero added sugar; carbs come from milk lactose.

faqs.q: How many carbs in Oikos Triple Zero?
faqs.a: 7 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber and 5 g sugars per container.

faqs.q: Is Oikos Triple Zero suitable for low-carb diets?
faqs.a: Yes, with only 4 g net carbs (7 g total minus 3 g fiber) per serving.
